text: Ehren McGhehey (born November 29, 1976) or Danger Ehren is an American daredevil and actor. He is known for being one of the crew members of Jackass. He has been in all of its movies. McGhehey was born on November 29, 1976 in McMinnville, Oregon. ==Movies== * Jackass: The Movie (2002) * Grind (2003) * Jackass Number Two (2006) * Jackass 2.5 (2007) * Jackass 3D (2010) * Jackass 3.5 (2011) * Jackass Forever (2022) ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Jackass site * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television personalities Category:Actors from Oregon Category:Comedians from Oregon
title: Ehren McGhehey
